attributes.description: Real Honest German Engineering. This Classy And Luxurious SUV Is Excellent For A Family. Our 2017 Model Is Presented In Silver With A Black Leather Interior And Aluminium Interior Trim. It Has Covered ONLY 53 000 km And Retains A Full Service History With Mercedes And Balance Of The 6 Year Or 100 000 km Mobilo Plan Up To June 2023. Amazing Features Include AMG Package, A Stunning Panoramic Glass Sunroof, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Xenon Lights, Satellite Navigation, Harmon Kardon Surround Sound System, Aluminium Running Boards, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Electric Seats With Memory, Heated Seats, Bluetooth, USB Input, Climate Control, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint, Towbar And 20 Inch Alloy Wheels. This Vehicle Is Fully Specced And Ready To Drive Off Our Floor. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
